mapper.sql: select qav.version_id, qav.project_id, qav.version_number, qav.version_status, qav.leader, qav.developer, qav.tester, qav.plan_finish_date, qav.actually_finish_date, qav.launch_date, qav.time_limit_version, qav.project_deviation_days, qav.project_deviation_percent, qav.demand_plan_finish, qav.demand_actually_finish, qav.demand_percent, qav.testcase_count, qav.testing_return, qav.dev_human_resources, qav.test_human_resources, qav.change_line_code, qav.bug_zm, qav.bug_yz, qav.bug_yb, qav.bug_ts, qav.code_di, qav.quality_review, qav.imprint, qav.remark, qav.create_by, qav.create_time, qav.update_by, qav.update_time, sp.project_name,sp.dept_id,sp.project_sign from qa_version qav left join sys_project sp on qav.project_id = sp.project_id
mapper.insert:
insert into qa_version
project_id, version_number, version_status, leader, developer, tester, plan_finish_date, actually_finish_date, launch_date, time_limit_version, project_deviation_days, project_deviation_percent, demand_plan_finish, demand_actually_finish, demand_percent, testcase_count, testing_return, dev_human_resources, test_human_resources, change_line_code, bug_zm, bug_yz, bug_yb, bug_ts, code_di, quality_review, imprint, remark, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{projectId}, #{versionNumber}, #{versionStatus}, #{leader}, #{developer}, #{tester}, #{planFinishDate}, #{actuallyFinishDate}, #{launchDate}, #{timeLimitVersion}, #{projectDeviationDays}, #{projectDeviationPercent}, #{demandPlanFinish}, #{demandActuallyFinish}, #{demandPercent}, #{testcaseCount}, #{testingReturn}, #{devHumanResources}, #{testHumanResources}, #{changeLineCode}, #{bugZm}, #{bugYz}, #{bugYb}, #{bugTs}, #{codeDi}, #{qualityReview}, #{imprint}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from qa_version where version_id in
#{versionId}
